author: Jonah Gruber
comment: Ski tracks only tracks the first run of the day. After starting the app pauses tracking after the first run. I've lost several long days of skiing to this bug. When this happens a notification appears in the notification bar that cannot be dismissed and the phone must be rebooted to remove it.

author: Tony Dang
comment: Best snow app to track where you been and to record speed and distance covered when working. With my 1plus1 5 stops recording after 1 run or an hour? What's going on?

author: Ross Smith
comment: Have always had this app on either android or iOS and I use it every year without problems. Its THE BEST ski tracking app. Packed with accurate information about your day and easily sharable by social media. Just wish they had an app for samsung watches, when that happens I will give it 5 stars as it will be perfect!

author: Aras Valentinavičius
comment: It used to be great, best app for skiing.  However something went wrong with some of the last updates, and tracking  does not work (on the same phone as last 2 years- Samsung Galaxy6) it only shows  lifting up and does not capture skiing down metrics. Only first slope max speed is recorded, but it is incorrect. Also distance is incorrect. Also noticed that backups from previous years have wrong calendar  dates.   Will reinstall and give a try tomorrow, maybe something went wrong with setup.  === Works fine after reinstall. 5 stars are back. Note for Samsung phone users: disable power saving, else GPS does not work.

author: Kristjan Raamat
comment: When it works it is great, but even with the latest update, it stops recording on my OnePlus 5 after 30-90min after start. When you fix it I will give it 5 stars, as it is a great app.

author: jimmy K
comment: Stops working after run 1. Was good. Now useless.

author: Barry Clark
comment: Well done on the OnePlus GPS fix, after updating the app today was the first time in a week that the app was still running after 6 hours, previously the app would pause recording after 90 minutes

author: Debra Brown
comment: Stops tracking now after metres. Worked flawlessly for last 3 years but now useless on android.

author: Mitchell Francis
comment: Dissapointed use to to a good app and now it cant pick up my gps after the firat hour it doesnt track anymore really bad waste of money

author: Scott Polson
comment: I absolutely love this app but the only issue I have is the lack of support for the Samsung Gear watches.

author: G M
comment: No good on android phone, loses GPS, does not record stats therefore is useless.

author: Miro Pranič
comment: GPS issues still not fixed

author: Stephen Parsons
comment: Cracking app, truly superb with Android Wear support too

author: Menno Menno
comment: The tracking keeps stopping on OP5T.. Also continually active in notification bar...

author: Andres Allas
comment: Stops on it's own between runs, otherwise good...

author: Ben Eastland
comment: Brilliant app great for comparing stats with friends! Wouldn't ski without it!

author: Gregory Tullo
comment: Wish that the average speed did not include ascent.

author: Thomas Roos
comment: Simply the best ski tracking app!  At first I had all the same issues as others experienced on my Android 8 device (Oneplus 5), but this is fixable by 'locking' the app in the app switcher 👍  With the lock engaged the apps keeps tracking and works better than all the rest out there. Others come close, but often still miss features in comparison with this app..

reply.author: Core Coders Ltd
reply.content: Hi Thomas, thanks for reviewing with the workaround. We have since fixed this and are currently rolling out v1.3.10 so the lock should no longer be necessary. Again thanks for leaving us a great review and please get in touch at skitracks-android@corecoders.zendesk.com in the future and we will be glad to help.

author: Michael Hodge
comment: Great app when working.  I'm into my third ski season using SkiTracks. Until recently it has worked flawlessly. I recently upgraded my smart phone and transfered all previous tracks between phones using the prescribed backup method.  Now the app is reporting three times as many descents as actual.  I have saved all tracks to my computer and reinstalled SkiTracks, but it is still reporting to many descents.  Anyone know how to fix this problem?

reply.author: Core Coders Ltd
reply.content: Hi Michael, sorry to hear the application isn't working correctly. Please get in touch at skitracks-android@codercoders.zendesk.com and we will do our best to help you. Thanks

author: Stefan Koser
comment: App paused randomly since using with Android 8 and one plus 5. Disabling power saving for the app did not help. UPDATE: turned off "Advanced Optimization" under "Battery Optimization"  in Android 8 - app worked fine again - changing rating back to 5 stars

reply.author: Core Coders Ltd
reply.content: Hi, sorry to hear Ski Tracks is not working correctly. We are currently rolling out version 1.3.10 that fixes some issues we were having with the GPS. Please update as soon as it becomes available. If this does not resolve the issue, please get in touch at skitracks-android@corecoders.zendesk.com. Thanks

author: Francesco Martire
comment: This is potentially the best ski tracking app as it was before and I'm ready to change my rating as soon as it will be fixed. Actually it goes in pause with no meaning loosing any track, and generates notifications which cannot be removed until you kill the process (this makes me suspect about some Oreo incompatibility).

reply.author: Core Coders Ltd
reply.content: Hi, sorry to hear Ski Tracks is not working correctly. We are currently rolling out version 1.3.10 that fixes some issues we were having with the GPS. Please update as soon as it becomes available. If this does not resolve the issue, please get in touch at skitracks-android@corecoders.zendesk.com. Thanks

author: Josh Costanza
comment: Keeps stopping or pausing and makes it unreliable for me. Started/unpaused at least 5 times in one day and lost countless runs and stats as I thought it was going. I have .y phone locked and no other apps running so there should be no excuse.

reply.author: Core Coders Ltd
reply.content: Hi, sorry to hear Ski Tracks is not working correctly. We are currently rolling out version 1.3.10 that fixes some issues we were having with the GPS. Please update as soon as it becomes available. If this does not resolve the issue, please get in touch at skitracks-android@corecoders.zendesk.com. Thanks

author: Henk Biemans
comment: Initially GPS stopped after few minutes on Android 6.0. On Android Wear 2, same issue.  Finally fixed by changing battery saving settings custom to unrestricted for this app... The SW should hint this solution. Now very happy with App performance.

reply.author: Core Coders Ltd
reply.content: Hi, sorry to hear Ski Tracks is not working correctly. We are currently rolling out version 1.3.10 that fixes some issues we were having with the GPS. author: K March
comment: Used to be great, now can't login or create a new account. Emailed support, not very helpful. Wondering if the Android 8.1 issue. PLEASE fix!!  In the meantime, anyone recommend other products?

reply.author: Core Coders Ltd
reply.content: Hi, sorry you thought we weren't very helpful. We will be in touch to help you resolve this problem. Thanks

author: vijaishanker b
comment: Useless app, got the paid version... Used it for a holiday in Austria... App skipped ski runs, merged 3 runs into 1 single run, etc... Complete disappointment for a paid app

author: Kyuhwa Lee
comment: It always pauses after a few runs so the tracking virtually doesn't work. It didn't have this issue until 2 years ago. Useless app now.

comment: Used to be my go to for tracking, but no longer working on Android 8 it seems. Me and a friend both have the same issue, while another friend with an older version of Android is not having any issues.

author: Paul Norman
comment: This has worked for me in past seasons going back 5 years or so. For some reason, it now tracks a run or two and pauses. I restart it, only to get 1-2 more runs before it pauses again. At the end of a day my 20 run day shows 5 runs. I see other friends posting their days, so maybe it's some interaction with my Oneplus 5? I'll keep trying for now with the hope that it gets resolved.

author: Steve Jessen
comment: Terrible app. Doesn't track accurately, gets completely confused if you stop on a slope, has a horrible UI, and by default it stops tracking without warning when your phone reaches 20%.

reply.author: Core Coders Ltd
reply.content: Hi, sorry to hear Ski Tracks is not working correctly for you. Please get in touch at skitracks-android@corecoders.zendesk.com and we will do our best to help.

comment: Was working great last season. Now no matter what I try it can't get a gps reading for more than 5 seconds and  records nothing.  Apparently this app hates android and loves iphone.

author: Neil Weaver
comment: Best available I think. Would be nice to see the map distinguish uphill and downhill lines (different colours perhaps?). And add "splitboarding" to the activities. What you skin up is as interesting to track as your ride down.

reply.author: Core Coders Ltd
reply.content: Hi Neil, splitboarding has been added :) and thanks for the maps suggestions. We have some exciting things in the pipeline. Stay tuned!

author: Simon A
comment: Utter waste of money but of course you dont find out until too late to get a refund. Worse though no data for 2 days skiing even though I checked and it said it was recording.

author: Jay Adamson
comment: Excellent App, simple to use and pretty accurate I've found by comparison to other tool. Excellent support from core coders. Those guys are keen to help with even the slightest issue.
